summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue from East 75th Street to East 77th Street, by constructing concrete sidewalks, grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 109000 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
